plot: A self-destructive woman who has a spiritual awakening becomes determined to live an enlightened life, creating havoc at home and work.
plot_en: A self-destructive woman who has a spiritual awakening becomes determined to live an enlightened life, creating havoc at home and work.
plot_es: A self-destructive woman who has a spiritual awakening becomes determined to live an enlightened life, creating havoc at home and work.
title: Iluminada
